artist: Maker: Scott Helmes; Printer: Philip Gallo; Publisher: Hermetic Press, Minneapolis
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Letters comprising the word "language" are scattered randomly across and down the sheet in Times New Roman Semi Bold typeface; housed with four other prints in an orange Canson folding portfolio with "5 Visual Poems / scott helmes karl kempton ian hamilton finlay philip gallo jonathan williams" in letterpress on front
title: Untitled (language)
